text: The Ticket-of-Leave Man is a 1918 British silent crime film directed by Bert Haldane and starring Daphne Glenne, George Foley and Aubrey Fitzmaurice. It is an adaptation of the 1863 melodrama The Ticket-of-Leave Man by Tom Taylor.Goble p.455 ==Cast== * Daphne Glenne as May Edwards * George Foley as Bob Brierley * Aubrey Fitzmaurice as Hawkshaw * Wilfred Benson as James Tiger Dalton * Rolf Leslie as Melter Moss * Rachel de Solla as Mrs. Willoughby * George Harrington as Eliza ==References== ==Bibliography== * Goble, Alan.
